name: Dearest You (web)
description:
One day, you find an unmarked letter in your mailbox. Who could it be from? And what will you do about it?

This is the web version of my submission for the O2A2 2021 jam. The jam rules were: only one sprite, one background, one sound effect, one music track and less than 1000 words. 

Original project page here. I recommend all PC/Mac users to head there, as the web version is heavily compressed.

  • Playtime 2-10 minutes
  • Two possible endings
  • OpenDyslexic font

Contains anxiety.

Comments and Let's Plays are welcome!
